text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, shogen ni atatte arra no tame kosei o kenji shi nasai. Tatoe anata gata jishin no tame, matawa ryoshin ya kinshin no tame (ni furina baai) demo, mata fusha demo, hinjadeatte mo (koseideare). Arra wa (anata ga tayori mo) soho ni motto chikai nodearu. Dakara shiyoku ni shitagatte,(kosei kara) sorete wa naranai. Anata gataga tatoe (shogen o) mage, matawa somuite mo, arra wa anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
